config:
0.9.0 VERSION
<javaTest url="http:///testjava.html"/> <porttest host="" application="video/portTest" timeout="3000"/> <bwMon server="" application="video/bwTest"/> <application uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" host="http:///bigbluebutton/api/enter"/>
<skinning enabled="true" url="http:///client/branding/css/BBBDefault.css.swf" />
<logging enabled="true" target="trace" level="info" format="{dateUTC} {time} :: {name} :: [{logLevel}] {message}" uri="http://"/>
<module name="ChatModule" url="http:///client/ChatModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" dependsOn="UsersModule" privateEnabled="true" fontSize="10" position="top-right" baseTabIndex="701" colorPickerIsVisible="true" maxMessageLength="1024" />
<module name="UsersModule" url="http:///client/UsersModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" allowKickUser="true" hideViewers="true" enableEmojiStatus="true" enableSettingsButton="true" baseTabIndex="301" />
<module name="DeskShareModule" url="http:///client/DeskShareModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///deskShare" publishURI="" useTLS="false" showButton="true" autoStart="false" autoFullScreen="false" baseTabIndex="201" />
<module name="PhoneModule" url="http:///client/PhoneModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///sip" autoJoin="true" listenOnlyMode="true" presenterShareOnly="false" skipCheck="false" showButton="true" enabledEchoCancel="true" useWebRTCIfAvailable="false" showPhoneOption="true" echoTestApp="9196" dependsOn="UsersModule" />
<module name="VideoconfModule" url="http:///client/VideoconfModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///video" dependson = "UsersModule" baseTabIndex="401" presenterShareOnly = "false" controlsForPresenter = "false" autoStart = "true" skipCamSettingsCheck="false" showButton = "true" showCloseButton = "true" publishWindowVisible = "true" viewerWindowMaxed = "false" viewerWindowLocation = "top" smoothVideo="false" applyConvolutionFilter="false" convolutionFilter="-1, 0, -1, 0, 6, 0, -1, 0, -1" filterBias="0" filterDivisor="4" displayAvatar = "false" focusTalking = "false" glowColor = "0x4A931D" glowBlurSize = "30.0" priorityRatio = "0.67" />
<module name="WhiteboardModule" url="http:///client/WhiteboardModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" dependsOn="PresentModule" baseTabIndex="601" whiteboardAccess="presenter" keepToolbarVisible="false" />
<module name="PollingModule" url="http:///client/PollingModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" dependsOn="PresentModule" />
<module name="PresentModule" url="http:///client/PresentModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" host="http://" showPresentWindow="true" showWindowControls="true" openExternalFileUploadDialog="false" dependsOn="UsersModule" baseTabIndex="501" maxFileSize="30" />
<module name="LayoutModule" url="http:///client/LayoutModule.swf?v=VERSION" uri="rtmp:///bigbluebutton" layoutConfig="http:///client/conf/layout-webtv.org.xml" enableEdit="false" />
